duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute long-term product roadmap and strategy aligned with business objectives.
Lead collaboration to manage and prioritize product roadmap and releases across multiple products.
Engage with customers and users to uncover needs and translate them into product solutions.
Identify and track Key Performance Metrics (KPIs), ensuring they deliver necessary business value.
Acquire, maintain, and apply advanced knowledge of the business, its products, and processes.
Model leadership competencies and promote a culture of continuous improvement and exceptional employee engagement.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business or related field (Master's preferred)
Experience in MS Office Suite, Product Management tools, and financial management
